title: KOLCHAK 114 The Trevi Collection [retr?tv]
description:
KOLCHAK: THE NIGHT STRALKER -1x14- THE TREVI COLLECTION  (1/24/1975)
   
A fashion industry spy falls to his death as Carl watches. This is the first in a series of strange deaths that seem to have a supernatural origin. Apparently Madame Trevi, a fashion designer, is using witchcraft to stop those who oppose her. Carl seeks the aid of a witches&#039; coven and follows their advice. But that may be exactly the wrong thing to do, leaving Carl to confront an angry witch with a few trinkets and his wits...

Stars Darren McGavin as Carl Kolchak
Guest star: Jack Grinnage (Ron Updyke), Ruth McDevitt (Emily Cowles) , Richard Bakalyan (First Hood), Lara Parker (Madelaine Perkins), Nina Foch (Madame Trevi), Bernie Kopell (Dr. Gravanites), Marvin Miller (The Lecturer), Priscilla Morrill (Griselda), Henry Brandon (The Man), George Chandler (Model Agency Manager), Douglas Fowley (Superintendent), Beverly Gill (Melody Sedgwick), Peter Leeds (Photographer), Henry Slate (Second Hood), Chuck Waters (Mickey Patchek)
Writer: Rudolph Borchert
Director: Don Weis
